name: UPWARD for Playdate
description:
Ported by Daniel Bokser, Matthias Falk's PICO-8 puzzle platformer, UPWARD, is now available on Playdate!

As with the PICO-8 version, the Playdate version is free!

This version also adds an optional HUD that keeps track of your best finish times and your lowest death count you got during a run.

Also, like the original version, your game is saved at the beginning of each level.

The source for this port has been released on Github under GPLv3.  It is also one of the very first games written in Zig for the Playdate!  Keep in mind you'll probably encounter spoilers if you look at the code before finishing the game!

Credits
  • Daniel Bokser - Ported UPWARD to Playdate.
  • Matthias Falk - Creator of the original UPWARD game on PICO-8 and contributed some UX ideas to the port.
